command.question: On host 'ALU-WEB-PROD-01', what was the parent process of the failed logon attempt?
command.query:
SELECT Name, CommandLine, PPID
FROM processes(host="ALU-WEB-PROD-01")
WHERE UserName = "alu-backupsvc$" AND StartTime >= "2024-05-21T10:55:00.123Z" AND StartTime <= "2024-05-21T11:05:00.123Z"

result: [SIMULATION] Velociraptor artifact collection was dispatched, but this is a simulation so no data was returned.
